questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Flags and signage
D) Wildlife and animals

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) People
B) Animals
C) Flags and a stop sign
D) Buildings

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) A flagpole with flags
D) A vehicle

What flags are visible in the photo?
A) American and Texas flags
B) Canadian and Mexican flags
C) State and city flags
D) National and international flags

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A stop sign
B) A bench
C) A tree
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) A large building
C) Trees and sky
D) A street with traffic

What can be seen near the base of the flagpole?
A) A bench
B) A vehicle
C) A stop sign
D) A person

What is the shape of the sign in the photo?
A) Circular
B) Triangular
C) Octagonal
D) Rectangular

What color is the stop sign?
A) Green
B) Yellow
C) Red and white
D) Blue

What is the color of the American flag in the photo?
A) Red, white, and blue
B) Green and white
C) Black and yellow
D) Blue and yellow

What is the color of the Texas flag in the photo?
A) Red, white, and blue
B) Green and white
C) Black and yellow
D) Blue and yellow

What is the position of the Texas flag relative to the American flag?
A) Above the American flag
B) Below the American flag
C) To the left of the American flag
D) To the right of the American flag

What type of building is visible in the photo?
A) A residential house
B) A commercial building
C) A small booth or guard station
D) A school

What is the color of the booth or guard station in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Black and gray
D) White

What is the shape of the roof of the booth or guard station?
A) Flat
B) Slanted
C) Curved
D) Dome-shaped

What is the condition of the sky in the photo?
A) Overcast
B) Clear with a few clouds
C) Stormy
D) Foggy

What word is written on the stop sign?
A) Yield
B) Stop
C) Go
D) Caution

What is the structural material of the flagpole?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Concrete

What is the height of the flagpole relative to the booth or guard station?
A) Shorter than the booth
B) Same height as the booth
C) Taller than the booth
D) Much shorter than the booth

What is the prominence of the flags in the photo?
A) They are barely visible
B) They are the main focus
C) They are in the background
D) They are partially obscured

What is the likely purpose of the booth or guard station?
A) Residential use
B) Commercial sales
C) Security or checkpoint
D) Educational purposes

What is the texture of the sky in the photo?
A) Smooth and clear
B) Rough and cloudy
C) Dark and stormy
D) Hazy and foggy

What is the condition of the flags in the photo?
A) Torn and tattered
B) New and crisp
C) Worn but intact
D) Faded and old

What is the visibility of the stop sign in the photo?
A) Obscured by foliage
B) Clear and unobstructed
C) Partially hidden by the booth
D) Covered by snow

What is the most prominent color in the background of the photo?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Brown
D) Gray

What is the relationship between the stop sign and the booth or guard station?
A) The stop sign is in front of the booth
B) The stop sign is behind the booth
C) The stop sign is inside the booth
D) The stop sign is to the left of the booth

What is the relationship between the flagpole and the stop sign?
A) The flagpole is to the left of the stop sign
B) The flagpole is to the right of the stop sign
C) The flagpole and stop sign are next to each other
D) The flagpole is in front of the stop sign

What is the relationship between the booth and the trees?
A) The booth is in front of the trees
B) The booth is behind the trees
C) The booth is to the side of the trees
D) The booth is among the trees

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Taken from above
B) Taken from below
C) Taken at eye level
D) Taken from the side

What is the shape of the star on the Texas flag?
A) Circular
B) Square
C) Triangular
D) Polygon

What is the orientation of the American flag in the photo?
A) Upside down
B) Left Side
C) Sideways
D) Backwards

What is the orientation of the Texas flag in the photo?
A) Upside down
B) Left side
C) Sideways
D) Backwards

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) People interacting

What is the structure in the photo?
A) A house
